items.q: What’s included in a bathroom deep clean?
items.a: Detailing of tiles and grout, shower screens and glass, tapware and fittings, vents and fans, mirrors and vanity, toilet sanitisation, and edges where soap scum builds up.
Usually 1–3 hours depending on bathroom size and condition.

items.q: Do you fix mould or silicone?
items.a: We remove surface mould and soap scum; structural silicone replacement is not included.
Yes, we bring professional cleaning products and tools suitable for bathrooms.
